summary: Defines a Django model that represents a registrant’s request to create a new domain, encapsulating all related fields, organization type choices, and a finite‑state machine that drives the application’s lifecycle (submission, review, approval, rejection, withdrawal). The model also handles sending templated email notifications at key state changes.
business_intent: Enable the system to collect, process, and track domain registration requests, enforce business rules through state transitions, and keep applicants and administrators informed via automated emails.
